entities.name: impedimenta
entities.description: The spell that Madam Hooch used to hit Harry with. ("It was she who had hit him with the Impediment Jinx.")

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: The flying instructor who hit Harry with the Impediment Jinx. ("What do you think you're doing? screamed Madam Hooch...")

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student who was being attacked by Harry and was hit with the Impediment Jinx. ("Malfoy was curled up on the ground, whimpering and moaning...")

entities.name: george
entities.description: One of the Weasley twins who was also involved in the fight. ("George was sporting a swollen lip...")

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Another one of the Weasley twins who was being restrained by the Chasers. ("Fred was still being forcibly restrained by the three Chasers...")

entities.name: crabbe
entities.description: A student who was cackling in the background during the fight. ("Crabbe was cackling in the background.")

relationships.description: Madam Hooch used the Impediment Jinx to hit Harry. ("It was she who had hit him with the Impediment Jinx.")
Madam Hooch hit Harry with the Impediment Jinx. ("What do you think you're doing? screamed Madam Hooch...")
Malfoy was affected by the Impediment Jinx. ("Malfoy was curled up on the ground, whimpering and moaning...")
George was attacked by Madam Hooch. ("What do you think you're doing? screamed Madam Hooch...")
